title: Flow Export: UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xeb in position 255: invalid continuation byte
body:
#### Problem Description

Flow export errors on some flows.

#### Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. `curl -kx127.0.0.8:8080 'http://httpbin.org/post' -H 'Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=a' --data-binary $'--a\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name="ctl00$BodyContent$txtAtesia"\r\n\r\nDuk\xeb\r\n--a--\r\n'`
2. `export.clip raw @focus`

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/master.py", line 54, in run_loop
    loop()
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/main_loop.py", line 287, in run
    self._run()
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/main_loop.py", line 385, in _run
    self.event_loop.run()                                           [*:8080]
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/main_loop.py", line 1494, in run
    reraise(*exc_info)
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/compat.py", line 58, in reraise
    raise value
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/asyncio/events.py", line 80, in _run
    self._context.run(self._callback, *self._args)
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/raw_display.py", line 416, in <lambda>
    wrapper = lambda: self.parse_input(
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/raw_display.py", line 515, in parse_input
    callback(processed, processed_codes)
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/main_loop.py", line 412, in _update
    self.process_input(keys)
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/main_loop.py", line 513, in process_input
    k = self._topmost_widget.keypress(self.screen_size, k)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/tools/console/window.py", line 316, in keypress
    k = super().keypress(size, k)
  File "/home/user/venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/urwid/container.py", line 1123, in keypress
    return self.footer.keypress((maxcol,),key)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/tools/console/statusbar.py", line 201, in keypress
    return self.ab.keypress(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/tools/console/statusbar.py", line 149, in keypress
    self.prompt_execute(text)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/tools/console/statusbar.py", line 169, in prompt_execute
    msg = p(txt)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/tools/console/statusbar.py", line 115, in execute_command
    execute(txt)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/tools/console/commandexecutor.py", line 18, in __call__
    ret = self.master.commands.execute(cmd)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/command.py", line 273, in execute
    return self.call_strings(command_name, args)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/command.py", line 259, in call_strings
    return self.commands[command_name].call(args)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/command.py", line 129, in call
    ret = self.func(*bound_args.args, **bound_args.kwargs)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/command.py", line 303, in wrapper
    return function(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/addons/export.py", line 189, in clip
    v = strutils.always_str(func(flow))
  File "/mnt/c/Users/user/git/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/utils/strutils.py", line 46, in always_str
    return str_or_bytes.decode(*decode_args)
UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xeb in position 255: invalid continuation byte
```

#### System Information
```
Mitmproxy: 8.0.0.dev (+19, commit a9f9256)
Python:    3.9.4
OpenSSL:   OpenSSL 1.1.1f  31 Mar 2020
Platform:  Linux-4.4.0-19041-Microsoft-x86_64-with-glibc2.31
```
